verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jewry|strong="G2449"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.
\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Jews’|strong="G2453"\w* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="G4634"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* at \w hand|strong="G1451"\w*.

\w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Depart|strong="G3327"\w* \w hence|strong="G1782"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* may \w see|strong="G2334"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w thou|strong="G4675"\w* \w doest|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add there is\add* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \add that\add* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w secret|strong="G2927"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2212"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w seeketh|strong="G2212"\w* to be \w known|strong="G1511"\w* \w openly|strong="G3954"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w do|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w shew|strong="G5319"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* to the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w did|strong="G4100"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w time|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3918"\+w* \+w not yet|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w come|strong="G3918"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5212"\+w* \+w time|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w alway|strong="G3842"\+w* \+w ready|strong="G2092"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The world|strong="G2889"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w hate|strong="G3404"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w it hateth|strong="G3404"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w testify|strong="G3140"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w thereof|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w evil|strong="G4190"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Go|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w up|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w feast|strong="G1859"\+w*: \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w go|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w up|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w feast|strong="G1859"\+w*; \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w my|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w time|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w is|strong="G4137"\+w* \+w not yet|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w full come|strong="G4137"\+w*.\wj*

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* he had \w said|strong="G2036"\w* these \w words|strong="G5023"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \add still\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* were gone \w up|strong="G0305"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w openly|strong="G5320"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w secret|strong="G2927"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w murmuring|strong="G1112"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: for \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, He \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a good \w man|strong="G0018"\w*: \w others|strong="G0243"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Nay|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* he \w deceiveth|strong="G4105"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G3305"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w openly|strong="G3954"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.

¶ \w Now|strong="G2235"\w* about the \w midst|strong="G3322"\w* of the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w letters|strong="G1121"\w*, \w having|strong="G3129"\w* \w never|strong="G3361"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G1699"\+w* \+w doctrine|strong="G1322"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w mine|strong="G1699"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w his that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2307"\+w*, \+w he shall know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w of|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w the doctrine|strong="G1322"\+w*, \+w whether|strong="G4220"\+w* \+w it be|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+add whether\+add* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w He that speaketh|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w seeketh|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w his own|strong="G2398"\+w* \+w glory|strong="G1391"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he that seeketh|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w his|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w glory|strong="G1391"\+w* \+w that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w the same|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0227"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Did|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w the law|strong="G3551"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add yet\+add* \+w none|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w keepeth|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the law|strong="G3551"\+w*? \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w go ye about|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w to kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*?\wj*

The \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Thou \w hast|strong="G2192"\w* a \w devil|strong="G1140"\w*: \w who|strong="G5101"\w* goeth \w about|strong="G2212"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I have done|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2041"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G2296"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w marvel|strong="G2296"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w gave|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w circumcision|strong="G4061"\+w*; (\+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the fathers|strong="G3962"\+w*;) \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G4059"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the sabbath day|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w circumcise|strong="G4059"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the sabbath day|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w circumcision|strong="G4061"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the law|strong="G3551"\+w* \+w of Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w should|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w be broken|strong="G3089"\+w*; \+w are ye angry|strong="G5520"\+w* \+w at me|strong="G1698"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I have made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w a man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w every whit|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w whole|strong="G5199"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the sabbath day|strong="G4521"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w Judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w according to|strong="G2596"\+w* \+w the appearance|strong="G3799"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2919"\+w* \+w righteous|strong="G1342"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2920"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* them of \w Jerusalem|strong="G2415"\w*, \w Is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w he|strong="G2076"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* to \w kill|strong="G0615"\w*?

\w But|strong="G2532"\w*, \w lo|strong="G1492"\w*, he \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w* \w boldly|strong="G3954"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Do|strong="G3379"\w* the \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w indeed|strong="G0230"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w very|strong="G0230"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*?

\w Howbeit|strong="G0235"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* this \w man|strong="G5126"\w* \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*, no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1097"\w* \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* as he \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Ye|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w both|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w me|strong="G2504"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w whence|strong="G4159"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w myself|strong="G1683"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w he that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w true|strong="G0228"\+w*, \+w whom|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w from|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and he|strong="G2548"\+w* \+w hath sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* they \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w take|strong="G4084"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w laid|strong="G1911"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w was|strong="G2064"\w* not \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w*, will he \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* than \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \add man\add* hath \w done|strong="G4160"\w*?

¶ The \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G1111"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w murmured|strong="G1111"\w* such \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w take|strong="G4084"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w a little|strong="G3398"\+w* \+w while|strong="G5550"\+w* \+w am I|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+add then\+add* \+w I go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w him that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Ye shall seek|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+add me\+add*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w where|strong="G3699"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w*, \+add thither\+add* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w cannot|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2064"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w Whither|strong="G4226"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w shall|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*? will \w he|strong="G3195"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w dispersed|strong="G1290"\w* among the \w Gentiles|strong="G1672"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1672"\w*?

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \add manner of\add* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Ye shall \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \add me\add*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w*, \add thither\add* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*?

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \add day\add* of the \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cried|strong="G2896"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1437"\+w* \+w any man|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w thirst|strong="G1372"\+w*, \+w let him come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w drink|strong="G4095"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w He that believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1691"\+w*, \+w as|strong="G2531"\+w* \+w the scripture|strong="G1124"\+w* \+w hath said|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w out of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w belly|strong="G2836"\+w* \+w shall flow|strong="G4482"\+w* \+w rivers|strong="G4215"\+w* \+w of|strong="G5204"\+w* \+w living|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w water|strong="G5204"\+w*.\wj*
